title: Freezer Chicken Enchiladas
description: Cheesy chicken enchiladas that freeze beautifully. Just thaw and bake for an easy dinner.
ingredients: 3 lbs chicken breast, cooked and shredded
2 cans (10 oz each) red enchilada sauce
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with chiles, 2 cups cheese, sour cream, and spices. Pour 1/2 cup sauce in pan. Fill tortillas with mixture, roll, and place in pan. Top with remaining sauce and cheese. To freeze: wrap tightly with foil. To bake from frozen: 375°F for 45-50 minutes covered, then 10-15 minutes uncovered.

title: Make-Ahead Lasagna
description: Classic Italian lasagna that freezes perfectly for easy weeknight dinners.
instructions: Cook noodles. Brown meat with onion, add sauce. Mix ricotta with eggs. Layer: sauce, noodles, ricotta, sauce, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with remaining cheese. Freeze or bake at 375°F for 60 minutes.

title: Freezer Breakfast Burritos
description: Grab-and-go breakfast burritos packed with eggs, sausage, and cheese.
instructions: Cook sausage, sauté peppers, scramble eggs. Fill tortillas with mixture and cheese, roll tightly. Wrap individually and freeze. Reheat from frozen in microwave for 2-3 minutes.
